summary: A re-texture for the Wild Penguins & Fluff's Followers - Winston the Penguin mods.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/O6kH7VE.jpg[/img]

[center]Skyrim's North is a harsh land. Freezing cold temperatures, bone chilling winds, blinding blizzards and death at every corner.
But despite all these dangers there is one animal that has withstand these elements. [/center]

[center]All with just it's sheer cuteness, the Snow Penguin![/center]
[center][color=#00ff00][size=3]Wow, made the Hotfiles!
Thank you everyone that supported this mod.[/size][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/RBH9T1u.jpg[/img]
10.09.2016[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/esRtxzi.png[/img] 

[center][youtube]y9gtWtCCryE[/youtube]
Thank you for the mod review [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/394634]Chaos_Hellfire[/url] (YouTube [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/ChaosHellfire]S.Silin[/url])
[i]"Skyrim Mods & More Episode 18: Ayleid Princess"[/i]


[youtube]fwUM--dUSTI[/youtube]
Thank you for the mod review [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5993230/?]Shinji72[/url] (YouTube [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ1nSWwpGdWljL96pBQpBxw]Shinji72[/url])
[i]"Not Only Penguins - Skyrim Mods Watch COMPILATION"


[youtube]M8MiUKigFw4[/youtube]
Thank you for the mod review [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/32178265/?]RaccoonImpweialist[/url] (YouTube [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCglXAaQtcAiYXhUNK-FEpXA]RaccoonImperialist[/url])
"[/i][i]Skyrim Mods: Wild Penguins by Jokerine"

[youtube]L__-Ik5F0AM[/youtube][/i][/center][size=2][center][i]Thank you for the mod review [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/32178265/?][/url][url=http://][/url]MxR (YouTube [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCglXAaQtcAiYXhUNK-FEpXA][/url][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4MGZcDG5hnzpi3hDpORkXw]MxR Mods[/url])
"[/i][i]WHY I DIDN'T GET SKYRIM REMASTERED - Skyrim Mods - 214"[/i][/center][/size]

[size=4]Description:[/size]

This mod is a re-texture of the Penguins used in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79077/?]Fluff's Followers - Winston the Penguin[/url] mod by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/38128255/?]Fl[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/38128255/?]uff Eisenkette[/url] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79108/?]Wild Penguins[/url] mod by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2543917]Jokerine[/url]. There four variations of them currently, [i]Spotted Penguin[/i], [i]King Penguin[/i], [i]Regular Black Coat[/i] & [i]Snow Penguin[/i]. Snow now has an Alt version with [i]non-fur feet[/i]. Look for it in the "optional" section.

[s]I might make more if I get time, [i]King Penguin[/i] comes to mind.[/s]  :D  

[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]Spotted Penguin is now released! 10.12.2016[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][center][color=#00ff00][size=3][b]King Penguin is now released! 10.9.2016[/b][/size][/color][/center][/font]

Also since the bird is a background animal / prop / small pet, I left the textures 1k. This should keep the ram usage down. I made this for myself but thought others would like to use these textures. 


[b][center][size=5]King Penguin[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/OFnlo4y.jpg[/img][/center][/b]

[b][center][size=5]Regular Black Coat[/size][/center][/b]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/g1WHLMq.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][center][size=5]Spotted Penguin
[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ynkr0Nb.jpg[/img]

[size=5]Snow Penguin[/size][/center][/b]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/GaVjkhn.jpg[/img][/center]
[b][size=4]
Features:[/size][/b]

- 1k Textures ( _n.dds & .dds files) for the [s]mobs,[/s] cute lil dudes.
- 5 different textures to choose from, Spotted Penguin, King Penguin, Regular Penguin, Snow Penguin or Snow Penguin "Non-Fur Feet".
- Each variation of penguin is made available for both Penguin mods mentioned on this page.

[b][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/b]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79108/?]Wild Penguins[/url] mod or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79077/?]Fluff's Followers - Winston the Penguin[/url] 
- No DLC's. 

[size=4][b]Installation:[/b][/size]

No special steps to install if using NMM, Mod Organizer or manual.

Manual = just drop the data folder in your SteamApps\common\Skyrim

[b][size=4]Compatibility:[/size][/b]

- Should work with any mod that Wild Penguins or Fluff's Followers - Winston the Penguin will work with.
- Some ENB's might change the color of the Penguins. I tested with no ENB and Vivid Enb. Both looked good on my end. Please let me know if something is wrong.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/BlfX3Q2.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/38128255]FluffEisenkette[/url] for the fuzzy lil guy.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2543917]Jokerine[/url] for making this great addition to Skyrim's North.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Thanks for checking out this mod![/size]

[size=5]Cheers[/size]
[/font][/b]
My other mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77713/?]Tribunal Royal Guard Armors Remake[/url] [/center]
author: Canlocu
